member.name: T:Diacom.APCRegKeys.APCRegKeys
member.summary: Creates or removes some registry values.

member.name: M:Diacom.APCRegKeys.APCRegKeys.CreateRegistryValues
member.summary: Creates registry values (APCService description and autorun for APCServiceControl).

member.name: M:Diacom.APCRegKeys.APCRegKeys.DeleteRegistryValues
member.summary: Deletes registry values (APCService description and autorun for APCServiceControl).

remarks.para: Argument for command line should be following: "-install" or "-unistall" -- the action to perform.
